tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,Partial Denture (Metal Based),
review: Handled the case of our Dental Implant in an excellent manner. Root canal treatment was also done very satisfactorily and effectively. Doctors' approach towards patient was very cordial.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am Chaithra and I am writing this review after completion of the treatment successfully,I am thankful to God as I found Dr.Rajesh ,a best dentist.. after going through lot of pain and loss from previous dentist, initially i was bit skeptical because of my bad experience with previous dentist who made me feel that mine was a complicated case and said none of the dentist could find a way to resolve the issue but when I met Dr.Rajesh he gave me soo much of confidence by saying my case is not complicated at all and when I visited him for the first time I was in so much of pain he immediately decreased the height of caps which gave me lot of relief and within 24 hours he gave me temporary caps which was good than the permanent caps given by my previous dentist..he is sooo kind and down to earth person...he is so good in terms of humanity he understood my situation and he gave discount on crowns and also guided me on the issue I am facing and gave me a gel to apply for free of cost which was given to get relief from the pain that i got from the treatment given by previous dentist ..he lisents everything soo patiently he gives time and gives his 100% in treatment which shows his dedication and concern towards his patients...and the quality of crowns is too good it looks like real teeth...he has great knowledge and his experience speaks in his treatment..i wish, had i met him earlier i could have saved myself by suffering from so much pain, loss of money,time and stress...its realy tough to find best doctors...please visit him for any kind of dental issues without being skeptical you will definitely not regret..i highly recommend him.
reply_text: Thanks alot forbur detailed review mam, really motivates us to do better. We r always there to help you in any way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Abnormal Tooth Color,Misaligned Teeth,
review: If there is any dentist who can provide you promising results, it's ONE & Only, Dr Rajesh!We had a very pleasant experience with Dr. Rajesh, Dr. Sindhu and their staff. I had undergone several treatments for my misalignment in teeth since 2012 at places like RV Dental College but I was never satisfied with the kind of service that was provided there, came to my rescue was one and only Dr. Rajesh who very well explained the underlying cause behind the misalignment and how it could be dealt with in the most painless process. Dr. Rajesh and Dr. Sindhu both were very patient with me and spent a lot of time trying to calm me down and making me understand how they would definitely deliver whatever was promised, that gave me so much confidence in myself and both the Drs. The staff  on the other hand was also very helpful and kind and always available to help whether it was a festive time, a holiday, I always used to get prior updates. I am more than satisfied with what was promised to me. Dr. Rajesh is very professional, he takes the time to explain what needs to be done and provides valuable advice , It's not easy to find a good dentist in todays time, I highly recommend Dr. Rajesh and Dr. Sindhu for any of your tooth ailments.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind, words, it was our pleasure to help u in the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I went for fitting composite cap on RCT done in last tooth in upper side that is quite inaccessible. It was comfortable experience with the doctor. Dr Rajesh consulted and treated nicely. Treatment was apt and I have no further pain after a month of cap installation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Implant Supported Denture Fixing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Deep Cleaning,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: I am regular visitor/client for my whole family  members dental treatment  to Dr. Rajesh dental clinic since 15 years .Dr. Rajesh is a nice ,polite,and gentleman and treats patients with great experience and patienceas also his wife Dr.Swetha.He suggests timely treatment with right diagnosis. The clinic has equipped with latest and appropriate equipments for the dental treatment. The cost also reasonable at par with similar clinics . I strongly recommend ro my friends and relatives to visit the clinic for any dental problems.

Best clinic for dental issues. The team of doctors are very patient in delivering the treatment and answering any questions. Dr. Rajesh and Dr. Swetha are very good in their field and their team was promt in (1) scheduling the appointments, (2) honouring those appointments. Even for follow up consolations, they were proactive in scheduling the appointments. Regarding the treatment, was very happy with the care and concern shown during the treatment and explained all the available options to me. Would highly recommend this clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Scaling / Polishing,Dental Checkup (General),Dental Cleaning,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
Dr Rajesh and his assistants are extremely professional and friendly. Took great care of all my dental issues and checked post appointments to ensure I'm doing fine. 
Dr Sindhu is an expert in RCT and carried out the procedure on my infected tooth/s.  Once again, extremely friendly and took great care before, during and post procedure. 

I live overseas and wait an entire year, so I can come back to the best in Bangalore. 
Both are very experienced in what they do and I  would recommend the clinic for all your dental needs.
